amendment.description: To ensure that the purchase price of flood insurance policies required to be purchased in areas of residual risk accurately reflects the level of flood protection provided by any levee, dam, or other man-made structure in such area.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4736 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4736 proposed by Senator Dodd to Amendment SA 4707. (consideration: CR S3962; text: CR S3962) To ensure that the purchase price of flood insurance policies required to be purchased in areas of residual risk accurately reflects the level of flood protection provided by any levee, dam, or other man-made structure in such area.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4736 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4736 proposed by Senator Dodd to Amendment SA 4707.
